== Ubuntu Avengers ==

This was a project to feed back daily usage issues with Ubuntu Touch to the dev team. Now, this is just a page with handy links for bug filing.

=== Information How To Fill Bug ===
<nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Touch/Bugs|Touch Bugs]]</nowiki>
